item.title: Podcast Mentor - Upwork
item.description:
Podcast mentor - train on all phases of podcast production
- Audio editing and recording
- Video editing and recording
- Intro, Trailers, Outtros
- Theme help
- Outline
- equipment advice and software recommendations

Hourly Range: $5.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 23:26 UTC
Category: Audio Production
Skills:Podcast
Skills: Podcast
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
